author: pipermerriam
content:
from the most recent conversation in https://discord.com/channels/890617081744220180/890617129425047583

I'm inclined to propose native discv5 connections and rendevous as two of the higher priority upgrades that we need to look at prioritizing.  It's pretty easy to keep putting them both off, but I'd like to consider prioritizing them soon.  2x packet upgrade is not trivial.  And we're right up against the point where onboarding actual users is viable and not having rendevous is likely to negatively impact network health.
